title: Life of Words / எழுத்தின் உயிர்
description: Participants craft and share their original poems. This event offers a platform for poets to showcase their talent and connect with an audience through the power of words. Winners will be selected separately for English and Tamil poems.
registration: Only college students are permitted to participate.
A valid college ID is mandatory.
Participants must wear the registration throughout the day.
Prior registration is mandatory to attend any event/workshops, either online or on-spot.
Re-entry is not allowed, and the fee paid for any event/workshops is non-refundable.
rules: Each poem must have a title.
Only one entry per participant is permitted.
Participants must register and submit their work via the registration form before 15.02.25.
The poem can be on any theme, but must be respectful and not offensive.
The poem must be in the designated language (ANY ONE LANGUAGE - TAMIL/ENGLISH).
Submissions must be original and plagiarism-free.
Offensive language and plagiarism are strictly prohibited and will result in disqualification.
The poem should not exceed 15 lines, excluding the title.
Use of AI-generated content is not allowed.
Evaluation will be based on Emotional Impact, Creativity, Language and Clarity, Depth of Meaning, Structure & Flow, and Number of Likes.
Submit your poem in PDF format, following the filename convention: 'Name-Title.pdf' (e.g., 'Harry-Memories.pdf').
Participants must uphold fair play, respect the final decision, and abide by the event organizer’s instructions.
Any kind of activities that disturb the decorum of the symposium will not be tolerated.
